metadata.synopsis: Player's trying to lift the beams off the half-elf, has previously failed the skill check, and cannot enter interactive dialogue. There is no cutscene or animation - you lift it or you don't - the half-elf is just suddenly free. In this PAD they failed the check and can't lift it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: There is no animation or interactive dialogue for this - you just click on the beam and you lift it or you don't.
